availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Requisitions for the Return of Fugitives from Justice, 1863-1867

body.p:
State of ohio
Scioto County ss

Before me John Wilson mayor of the City of Portsmouth in the County aforesaid personally came Harriet Jane Brown who being duly sworn, according to law deposeth and saith That John Philip Noel late of the County aforesaid, on the 14th day of October A D 1865, in the County of scioto aforesaid in and upon one Harriet Jane Brown then and there being did unlawfully make an assault and her the said Harriet Jane Brown then and there did beat strike, wound and ill treat with intent, her the said Harriet Jane Brown, violently, forcibly, and against her will then and there unlawfully and feloniously to ravish and carnally know to the great damage of the said Harriet Jane Brown And further deponent saith not

figure.ab:
SEAL OF THE CITY OF PORTSMOUTH
OHIO

body.p: sworn to before me & signed in my presence this 16th day of October A D 1865

John Wilson
Mayor of the City of Portsmouth

affidavit
State of Ohio vs John P Noel
filed Oct the 1618
A D 1865

State of Ohio
Scioto County. ss:

Before me John Wilson Mayor of the City of Portsmouth personally came Harriet Jane Brown who being duly sworn according to law deposeth and saith That John Philip Noel, mentioned in the within affidavit is a fugitive from Justice in this state and is now in the state of Kentucky and further deponent saith not
sworn to by the said Harriet Jane Brown before me and by her signed in my presence the 25 day of October A D 1865

John Wilson
Mayor of the City of Portsmouth
SEAL OF THE CITY OF PORTSMOUTH
OHIO
